Package Model

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Tile
  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile for the Scrabble game - Module 2 Project. Each tile represents a character with points.

    finale
    Author:
    Hung Nguyen
